title: Want to watch a replay from 8.1 that I have downloaded...?
body: I downloaded my first ranked game back to the game this season because I got a penta and I was going to make a highlight of it but when I try to open it, it says can't play replay from 8.1 because we're in 8.2... Tried looking online but can't find anything. Anyway I can watch it? Is there another site that dose replays? Kinda shitty...

replies.body:
If you already downloaded it it should be in your documents on your PC (Documents>Leagueoflegends>replays)

However, if you only saved the replay, then sadly there is no way to view it because it isn't a standard video file, so only the League client can read it.....

I've had issues with this in the past as well...
